shortDescription: Tenda AX3 V16.03.12.11 was discovered to contain a command injection vulnerability via the lanip parameter at /goform/AdvSetLanip.
vulnerabilityName: Tenda ax3_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
